plugin-data.name: Contact3
plugin-data.description: Add a contact form to Bludit, with the ability to use a custom template.

only-published-content-appears-in-this-l: Only published content appears in this list. Remove the selected page to deactivate the contact form.
this-is-the-address-you-want-the-email-t: This is the address you want the email to be sent TO.
this-is-used-for-email-receiver-name-and: This is used for email receiver name and in CC email for sender name.
please-enter-a-valid-email-address: Please enter a valid email address
please-enter-the-content-of-your-message: Please enter the content of your message
thank-you-for-contact: Thank you for contacting me. I will reply you as soon as possible.
an-error-occurred-while-sending: Sorry, for some reason the mail server did not accept the mail for sending. Please try again later.
the-visitor-receives-a-copy-of-his-messa: The visitor receives a copy of his message.
you-can-set-an-individual-email-subject-: You can set an individual email subject text for the email copy. If emtpy the general subject is used.
please-fill-in-the-following-values-if-y: Please fill in the following values if you want to send messages by a smtp account.
you-can-use-a-captcha-service-for-spam-p: You can use a captcha service for spam protection. This adds a captcha in the end of the form.
before-activation,-you-need-to-register-: Before activation, you need to register your website at Google reCaptcha. Choose Version 2. The Site Key and Secret Key are required.
Before activation, you need to register your website at hCaptcha. The Site Key and Secret Key are required.
please-confirm-that-you-are-a-human-and-: Please confirm that you are a human and not a robot.
if-possible,-use-the-email-address-of-th: If possible, use the email address of the visitor. However, some hosts require an email address known on the server. In this case, you can choose between the recipients address (above) or a special sender email address (below) as the sender.
only-required-if-you-use-a-special-email: Only required if you use a special email sender address. Some hosts only allow sending emails from a locally known address.
if-necessary,-a-checkbox-with-a-custom-l: If necessary, a checkbox with your own legal text can be inserted in the form. The visitor must activate the checkbox to submit.
if-enabled,-the-gdpr-legal-text-will-be-: If enabled, the GDPR legal text will be inserted into the email.
